Conditions

Snow report summary

Weather Conditions
Overcast
Overnight Snow
1cm
Base Temp.
-7°C

Updated on Jan 01, 2023 at 07:48

The daily snow report is taken at the Summit weather plot at 1950m. Sign up below and stay up to date on all our snow and weather forecasts!

Lift & Grooming Status

On The Hill

Happy New Year!

Come on up to Whitewater to get in your first turns of 2023. The sun will likely make an appearance paired with some awesome conditions on the slopes and Nordic trails.

Were full mountain operations and have some new groomed trails for you to enjoy.

We cant wait to see you all up here today!
